post.summary: Changes a user's NetID in AD / Office 365 / Box to newnetid@byu.edu
If it is able to change the primary email address on an account it does so and returns a 200. Otherwise returns a 409

put.summary: Unlocks the given Active Directory account.

parameters.description: Must be unlock, enable, or disable
parameters.name: command

get.summary: Checks that an AD account does not have a mail box and that the email address is unreserved or valid
Returns the @ad.byu.edu and @byu.mail.onmicrosoft.com addresses for the given account
Returns common information for an account. Useful for OSC and CSRs troubleshooting. Optionally returns restricted records
Returns all email addresses associated with the email account, excluding the @ad.byu.edu and @byu.mail.onmicrosoft.com addresses

post.summary: Invites a user back into the enterprise

put.summary: Unlocks a mailbox by allowing access to it again. Removes Send/Receive quotas of 0.

get.summary: Checks that an AD account does not have a mail box and that the email address is unreserved or valid

delete.summary: Call for ServiceNow to either remove the employee email address from a student employee mailbox or to lock a mailbox for a non-student.
Deletes a particular EAM Alias. To be used by Alias Manager.

put.summary: Validates the creation or update of an EAM Alias without making any changes.

get.summary: Gets API Status
Returns common information for an account. Useful for OSC and CSRs troubleshooting

put.summary: Reconnects a disconnected mailbox to the user it used to be connected to. The reconnect must happen before Exchange policy has completed a deletion of the mailbox.

post.summary: Rolls a user out of the enterprise

delete.summary: Locks a mailbox so it cannot be logged into. Also sets Quotas for send/receive to 0 so it cannot receive or send email.

get.summary: Ping
Returns True if account is on litigation hold. False otherwise

post.summary: Creates a shared mailbox and adds permissions to that shared mailbox

get.summary: Validates an AD user exists (Ignores if it has a mailbox). It returns the email address that the user should be assigned.

post.summary: Verifies that Users and Groups are fine to use with Exchange Full Access and SendAs Permissions

get.summary: Checks an email address for both reservation and format

put.summary: Creates or updates a particular EAM Alias. To be used by Alias Manager.

post.summary: Finds all mailboxes that match the search query. Returns restricted records as well.

get.summary: Returns 200 if it is okay to change the email address on the account. Otherwise returns a 409 if there is an issue
Gets Last Bad Password Attempt Time / Number of Bad Passwords for a User

post.summary: Search for messages that have passed through Exchange Online.

get.summary: Returns the employment codes for someone. 404 means they were never an employee
Given a user's account ID, checks to see if the user exists and is marked as enabled.

post.summary: Starts a move of a mailbox to Exchange Online.

get.summary: Checks an email address for both reservation and format

post.summary: Create a mailbox and account for a Room or for Equipment.

Creates a mailbox for a student and assumes netid@student.byu.edu. Will unlock a mailbox if it is already locked and possibly migrate them to the cloud. Do not use this function unless you talk to the EUP team first
Creates a mailbox for an existing student given the user's current and valid account ID. Will return 201 if student already has an account.

get.summary: Recursively looks up an email address in Alias Manager. Returns the results and any errors it finds
Gets Information about a user in Box
Checks an email address for both reservation and format
Validates an AD user exists (Ignores if it has a mailbox). It returns the email address that the user should be assigned.
Recursively looks up an email address in Alias Manager to find the ultimate destinations.

put.summary: Removes Anti-spam inbound policy (Junk Email Folder).
Sets Anti-spam inbound policy (Junk Email Folder).

get.summary: Returns information relating to a particular EAM Alias. To be used by Alias Manager.

post.summary: Finds all mailboxes that match the search query.

get.summary: Returns the account type for an account. Examples are Generic,User,Shared,Room,Equipment
Gets Information about a user in Box. Returns restricted records

post.summary: Creates a generic mailbox and Exchange user account to be used by a department (Generic account).
Creates a mailbox for an existing user given the user's current and valid account ID.

put.summary: Mail enables security groups in Exchange

info.title: ExchangeServiceNow
info.description: API endpoints for use by Service Now email orders, Provisioning, Office Help, and Alias Manager
